content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron plate factory at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of 
- Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0), 
- Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0), 
- Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0), 
- Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0), 
- Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0), 
and their respective neighbouring chests

### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of 
- Burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5), 
- Chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5), 
- Small electric pole (position x=2.5, y=1.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of 
- Burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5), 
- Chest (position x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has sufficient fuel to operate
### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has sufficient fuel and ingredients to smelt
### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that the steam engine has a sufficient input liquid and fluid connections
### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that the boiler has sufficient fuel to operate
### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump has a sufficient fluid connection and output point
### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that the pipe group has a sufficient fluid connection and output point
### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure that the electricity group has a sufficient voltage and pole connections
